formula: a(n)= (5^n)*stirling2(n+2, 2), n>=0, with stirling2(n, m)=A008277(n, m).a(n)= -5^n+2*10^n.G.f.: 1/((1-5*x)*(1-10*x)). E.g.f.: diff((((exp(5*x)-1)/5)^2)/2!, x$2) = -exp(5*x)+2*exp(10*x).Sum(5^(k-1)*5^(n-k)*binomial(n, k),k=1..n). - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Sep 24 2006a(0)=1, a(n)=10*a(n-1)+5^n. [From Vincenzo Librandi, Feb 09 2011]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
